name: Circle Me
description:
Test your skills and mind in the all new and addicting 'Circle Me'

Tap the corresponding colour as the outer circles rotate around the larger middle circle.

Complete each colour in the sequence before the inner circle reaches the edge. This inner circle also shows you the next colour in the sequence.

Challenge your mind, think and react fast.

Share your high score with your friends and see if they can beat you.

Prepare to be addicted
